sections.heading: Improvements; costs borne by district
sections.text: All costs of the improvement other than the costs to be covered by special assessments as finally determined shall be borne by the sanitary district.SourceLaws 1927, c. 144, ยง 2, p. 392;C.S.1929, ยง 31-612;Laws 1933, c. 136, ยง 26, p. 539;C.S.Supp.,1941, ยง 31-612;
